org.talend.commons.utils.threading
Class ExecutionLimiter

java.lang.Object
  org.talend.commons.utils.threading.ExecutionLimiter

public class ExecutionLimiter
extends java.lang.Object

Limit the execution of threads by verifying at call of startIfExecutable if the process can be executable at this moment. If not the current process is aborted and the execute method is not called. If yes the current process is executed by call the execute method.
$Id$
